metadata.title: Phase 3C Impact & Risk Assessment VEGA Attestation

smoke_test_context_acknowledgment.per_section_4: All conclusions acknowledge smoke test limitations

verification_items.item: Budget impact analysis per call site
verification_items.evidence: CSR-v1 includes ADR-012 budget impact for each site
CS-006 notes $50/day ceiling, CS-009 notes $10/hour burn-in rate
TRP-v1 sequences low-cost sites first (night research)
BDA-v1 confirms fail-closed triggers after response, not before billing
BDA-v1 analyzes timing → ordering → cognition chain for state impact
CS-001, CS-009, CS-010 all have concurrency analysis in BDA-v1
TRP-v1 rollback triggers include 'database contention errors'
Phase 3b smoke test writes to asrp_state_log successfully
DG-v1 maps all cognitive chains including SitC-InForage-IKEA interplay
CS-009 deferred to Tier 4 due to temporal skew risk
CS-010 CEIO analysis includes reward bias accumulation risk
CS-003 deferred to Tier 4 until 48h post-expiry stabilization

critical_findings: No Tier 1 (safe) call sites - all require controlled rollout
Speciale expiry (2025-12-15) is a hard blocker for CS-003
Brain Bridge (CS-009) BURN-IN MODE requires async telemetry before wrapping
CEIO learning loop (CS-010) requires timestamp mitigation
recommended_mitigations_accepted: Implement async telemetry queue for high-volume sites
Add latency_budget_exceeded flag for market-sensitive calls
Handle Speciale expiry explicitly in telemetry

governance_gate_g3c.recommendation: PHASE 4 may proceed with Tier 2 and Tier 3 call sites ONLY. Tier 4 sites (CS-003, CS-009) require separate CEO authorization after blocking issues resolved.

vega_cgo.attestation: Phase 3C Impact & Risk Assessment complete. All four artifacts (CSR-v1, DG-v1, BDA-v1, TRP-v1) reviewed and attested. Economic Safety (ADR-012), State Reliability (ADR-018), and Cognitive Integrity (ADR-021) compliance verified. Recommend PHASE 4 proceed with Tier 2-3 sites only; Tier 4 sites blocked pending resolution of Speciale expiry and BURN-IN MODE completion.

stig_cto.attestation: Phase 3C analysis executed per CEO Directive. READ-ONLY mode maintained. ZERO-MUTATION confirmed. All risk assessments based on code inspection, not execution. Artifacts deposited in 05_GOVERNANCE/PHASE3C/ as mandated.
